channel.title: Cache inside folder :\
channel.description:
Okay, so it's been 6 years since i've even hosted and i use to leach and now i actually want to learn some things i've tried for a hour on my own trying to put the cache in the folder instead of my home user directory in my (C:) , all i want to do is put my cache in the folder and let it load from the folder so i can archive it and upload it to a link and give it to my buddy so he can connect and he's gonna teach me how to code, I just need help doing it or told how to do it i can take direction pretty easy i know it has to do with signlink.java
I'm working on the Lost Legacy release.

item.title: Cache inside folder :\
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

You will need to change all the places where your client is loading data from the user.home directory and replace it with your root directory (./).

Read full topic
